title: Matthew 6: The Sermon on the Mount, Part 2
short_title: Matthew 6: The Sermon on the Mount, Part 2
content: The Sermon on the Mount, Part 2

is a continuation of Jesus’ sermon on the mount. In this chapter He especially emphasized the blessings that come from putting the Lord first in our lives and worshiping Him because we love Him—not because we want others to think we are righteous. The counsel in verses 25–34 was especially for the newly-called Apostles, and although this specific counsel may not be for all of us, each Church member can apply the principles taught in those verses.
